name: Goat Milk
description:
Saponified oils of: olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, and cocoa butter.

Ingredients: goat milk

Unscented bar, has No Preservatives, Not tested on animals and 100% biodegradable.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE NOTE: Handmade soap will last a long time if kept dry between uses. Please use a draining soap dish and keep it away from direct streams of water.

NOTE: The images are for reference only. Products are made by hand using natural ingredients. Please allow for color differences in your finished products.

**Each bar is hand cut and may range from 4.2 oz - 5oz**
